live_updates: Technicians have identified the source of the issue but are unable to proceed with work due to safety concerns in the area. Work will continue in the morning, and we thank you for your continued patience.
Our technicians continue to repair services through the night.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
60397.summary: Some customers in Paul Lake are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
60397.title: Apr 22 - Paul Lake | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)

live_updates: Teams have confirmed a power outage is present in the area affecting our equipment. Please refer to your local power company for any updates. Once power is restored, services in the area should begin working. Our next update will be after the power is restored. Thank you for your patience.
